name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I See You; an Ancestral Connection

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I See You; an Ancestral Connection: By Neka King

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Natural and protective hairstyles are some of the most defining heritage markers Black people proudly display. The two figures' hair flows and intermingles, suggesting a timeless shared connection through identity.

Neka King (she/her) is an artist, muralist, and illustrator based in Atlanta, GA. Her work represents a fantastical twist on heritage and experience.
